1.content:
Somewhere in the Midwest of the United States, a small community was growing into a small town named Glendale. A town that did not have very much to offer, jobs were okay and education was doing well also. It was a very small tight community, where everyone got along and crime was low. On one side of town there was nothing but woods and plants. On the other side there were train tracks, which are nothing special. There really wasn't anything wrong with the community. This town had everything, from a store to a movie theater. The only thing that made this town any different was that there was no big city for miles. Meaning that around this town was the woods and train tracks.

Now the begin the story

The sun was just beginning to rise in Glendale. The sun was aim right into the 14 year old room. The 14 year old happens to be Kate. She was just sleeping away with no alarm on, because it was the weekend. Kate started to stir and wake up, but something other then the sun was waking her up. It turns out to be her dog that was jumping up and down on the bed. “uhhhhhh Fred get off of me”Kate said putting her head into the pillow. When she tried to go back to sleep Fred her Dog poked his paw into her side, causing her to jump. “hahhaahha fred, Ok OK im up” Kate said getting up from her sleep. Kate got up and stretch and just as she is about to look outside. She gets jumped from behind.

"What the" Kate says falling to the ground. It turnout to be her sister Kelly who is 12 years old. "Kelly get off" , as Kelly had pinned Kate to the ground. " Kelly stop it, get off me" Kate trying to get free. "I got you now big sis, time for your punishment" Kelly said a smiling grin on her face.

Kate was pinned and her arms were trapped under Kelly's thighs. Kate try and try to wiggle to get free but it was no use. With all the wiggling and moving Kate accidentally pushed her pajama tank top up exposing part of her midriff and her navel. " you know what big sis, I always wondering why you wear crop tops and tank tops to expose her belly, but I Guess I figure it out" "nooooooooo Kelly you can't" "I can't what", as Kelly showing started to wave her fingers behind her back. "NOOOOOOOOOOOMPPHHHHHH" Kate said as Kelly put her right hand over her Kate's mouth. "now I know big sister doesn't want to wake mommy and daddy, now does she" Kelly said tickling Kate side and running circles around her belly and her Navel. "HAHAHAMPHHHHAOHA" is all Kate manged to get out as the tickling continued.

Kelly continued the tickle torture on Kate ticklish belly and Navel. Kate was drawing circles with her finger and drilling it into Kate's navel. "That's Kate laugh for me" Kelly said she was wiggle fingers like a feather on her sister's poor belly. the punishment lasted for a good 20 minutes until Kate was red in the face.

"MPHI GIVE UP" Kate said red in face. Kelly stopped the tickle torture to let her sister have a rest. "OK I think you have had enough of a punishment today" as Kelly gave one last tickle to she exposed side. Kelly got off Kate, and Kate just lay there as Kelly walk out of the room. Kate got up to stretch and to look out side to see what ______time of year it was.

What time of year.
1.title: Every story as a beginning

choices: The Carnival fill of rides with surprises
Go to a friends house for the day
11.content:
Looking outside Kate saw that it was summertime, which meant that it was summer vacation. There was no school and she had all the free time in the world to do what she wanted.

"Kids breakfast is ready" Kate's mom said as Kate was just leaving her room. Kelly and Kate ran downstairs to go get Breakfast. Kate's parents were downstairs around the dinner table with Breakfast ready to be served.

So they went on to eat Breakfast. Kate's mom asked "any plans for the summer, now that school is out".

"not sure yet, mom" Kate said grabbing a plate. With it being summer time, it was the time of year were carnivals, festivals, family vacations were happening. "I was thinking maybe we could take a family vacation somewhere" mom said.

Kate's dad noticed that some of Kate's midriff was showing and gave her Kate a quick poke in her bare side. "hahahah, DAD" " why in the world must you wear small shirts Kate" Kate's dad said poking her in the side. "you know you leave your self vulnerable to tickling" "hahah I know dad hahah, the style is what is in hahha" Kate laughing, as her dad was probing and poking her side and midriff.

"so about that family vacation, what do you guys think" dad said, with tickling his ticklish daughter midriff. "Im down"Kelly said. "Im was thinking about doing something else, I would be down later in the summer" Kate said.

After they finished their breakfast, Kate ran upstairs to take a shower and to get ready for the adventures that awaited her. After getting done with her shower, she ran to her closet to pick out a outfit. "can't decide what to wear" as Kate was going through each shirt. Then she saw it, a crop top that was made to show her midriff. It was a crop top that was shredded from just above her belly button, and just her ribs. "perfect" she said as she put it on, letting midriff be exposed to the world.

So whats next for are ticklish adventure?
11.title: It's sunny, must be summer time

114.content:
After texting with her friend Erin, Kate decides to walk over to her house. After all, Erin’s family has a pool and her parents are out of town, so they can enjoy the whole day there, working on their summer tans by the pool, talking about boys, and perhaps playfully tickling each other at times (since her pal Erin is almost as ticklish as Kate, though in different spots on her body). Erin texts back saying to bring her bikini and some sleeper wear, in case Kate wants to spend the night. One thing leads to another, and soon Kate has her little sister in tow, too, and they both walk the few blocks over to Erin’s house.

         Once there, the two living dolls just walk right in to their friend’s house, since they are regulars there, and they hear the sweet laughter of their friend Erin coming from:
114.title: Visit her friend Erin

choices: go to a haunted house with friends
12.content:
As Kate got to the window, she noticed that the leaves were changing which meant that it was fall outside. After looking outside for a bit. She took a shower and changed into a small sweatshirt and jeans and went downstairs.

When she got downstairs she noticed that her sister Kelly was gone along with her parents. Then she look on the dining room table, which a note was from her parents.

Kate,

When to the store to go shopping to get Halloween stuff to decorate the house.
Be back later today.

PS. one of are close neighbors wanted to ask you if you wanted to make some money babysitting, there youngest daughter Lucy sometime during the week or even today. Here the number if you want the job:
679-547-1514

Mom, Dad, and Kelly.

"OK cool" Kate said putting the note and thinking about what she was going to do today.

Now with it being fall there is usually Halloween parties, fall festivals, and haunted houses to go to or she can just babysit today.

What's next for are young ticklish teen.
12.title: Autumn is in the air

choices: Into a room on the second floor
Down the hallway and up another set of stairs
123.content:
Kate picked up the phone and called their neighbor to ask how much the babysitting job would pay. She was surprised to hear it was more than she usually got, but it would last most of the weekend. She has never babysat for them before or really knew who they were, but since her mom stated they were "close neighbors", it must be someone she trusts.

After writing down the address, Kate got ready and grabbed a few things headed on over to the house on her bike.

When Kate got to the house minutes later, she noticed it was old, large and clearly fallen into decline. She got off her bike and walked towards the front door, which was nearly 100 yards away. She propped her bike up against a tree and then hopped lightly up the steps and rapped her small fist against the door. She knocked a second time, and moments later was greeted by the sound of rusty hinges swinging.

A very tall man stood over her, with a peculiar smile on his face. He was unshaven, in his forties, and had a slight potbelly. Kate smiled politely. "Mr. Jones?" she said. "Hi, I'm Kate, the babysitter." "Call me Carl," the man said, stepping aside. "Come in!". She gratefully crossed the threshold. It took her eyes a moment to adjust to dark, while Carl shut the door behind her.

Kate stood in a musty hall, with stairs leading up in front of her and doorways to the left and right. The only light came from the right. She leaned her head around the doorway and saw a cluttered living room, with a television set to mute and some old, overladen bookshelves. In a large chair a second man sat, this one uglier than the first--he was fat, but about the same age as the other. Both men were staring a little too long at her body and outfit (a crop sweatshirt that stopped just above her belly button, a tight pair of skinny jeans and sneakers with ankle socks.)

Kate was feeling the first sensation of nerves when the fat man said "This is a no shoes house," gesturing at her sneakers. "Umm," She replied, turning uneasily. Behind her, the other man was latching the door shut. Something didn't feel right, and Kate had never been in a scary situation like this one. The teenager took a nervous half-step backwards, away from both the living room doorway and the front door where the man still stood. "I, uh, where is Lucy the girl I am babysitting?," she asked hesitantly.

Kate was backpedaling now, fear visible on her lovely face. She was stammering some sort of protest, but clearly the girl had never been presented with real danger before, and was freezing up. "She looks like a tough one, don't she?" his friend said. "Back off!" Kate shouted, proving the man correct. She was against the stairs now, and had backstepped up the first of them. But both men kept advancing, and Kate continued to retreat up the stairs. "It's okay," the man said mock-soothingly. Before him, Kate continued to back up the stairs, one nervous step at a time. Behind him, he could hear the heavy breathing of his partner, a man of considerable strength but likely worthless in a chase. "Just calm down, and let's talk. I think there's been some sort of misunderstanding," he went on.

Kate was unfooled. The pretty teen was young, but already had grown to recognize the look in men's eyes when they were thinking less than noble thoughts about her. "Get away, you creeps!" she shouted again, and then she turned, disappearing into the second floor. Carl sighed and broke into pursuit--he was in less than ideal shape, but he knew the house, and there were two of them.

She ran.....
123.title: babysit Lucy

1231.content:
Carl cleared the landing as Kate slammed shut one of the nearest doors. A faint scratching behind it sounded as she slid some piece of furniture against it--probably the short table beside the door. The man briefly considered ramming the door, but instead proceeded down the hall to the next door--the adjoining rooms were connected.

He pushed open the door, revealing a long-unused bedroom. Outside he could hear his companion reach the top of the stairs and pause, while he went into hunter mode.

He followed carefully into the adjoining room, which was similar, if even more cluttered with decades past than the first. If the light was better, he'd have tracked Kate's tiny footsteps in the dust. As it was, he slowly trekked around the room, she'd been here--and likely still was. Gradually his eyes settled on the closet set opposite the bed. It was a natural hiding spot, and he approached it eagerly.

"Come out, come out, wherever you are..." he taunted, reaching a hand towards the door. It was shaking with adrenaline--he was excited by the chase, the girl's defiance, and increasingly his mind was preoccupied by his ideas for how to punish the girl. And then she lunged out from her true hiding spot--behind the bed, where she'd crouched with a broomstick in hand. Her face was a mask of steely determination and anger as she swung it directly at hiss face.

It was an precise, powerful blow--from a larger person, it would surely have incapacitated the man. But her small frame could carry only so much force. The man was staggered, but conscious, as the teenager raced past him. Kate was fast, and faster still in her desperation. The man's head swam from the force of her blow--she was a tough girl. If she had been less of a slender waif, he'd have been down for the count! But his blood was up now, too. The excitement and anticipation of the chase, the anger at her defiance, the rush of action; he pivoted and pursued the teen as she went fleeing from the room.

They tore through the adjoining bedroom, Kate throwing the hall door shut behind her. He slammed into it fully, blasting past with a second angry groan. She darted into the opposite doorway, barely with time to push it shut before he was there. He'd have had her in his grasp, if only the room hadn't been so cluttered with old lamps and furniture. The tiny girl ducked her way under a stack of shelves that his broad, portly torso couldn't fit through, and she gained several seconds on him as he pushed around them.

He barely reacted as a porcelain vase arced though the air towards him. Kate wasn't merely running, but fighting! The lamp struck him on the shoulder, and for a moment he staggered--inviting a second wave of old books, a brass clock, and whatever else the girl could seize, to follow the lamp. She kept trying to throw items at the man not knowing that his rather large friend Frank was making his way behind her. There was another doorway in the back left side that connected both rooms. She was too busy fending off one man that she let her guard down behind her. After a couple more items thrown at Carl, Frank was right behind her and made the hush noise with his finger to his accomplice.

Frank quickly wrapped his arms around Kate's upper body, pinning her arms to her chest in a bear hug fashion. She let out a loud squeal of shock that Frank came up right behind her. He was able to lift her off the ground and easily started to carry her out of the room. While being carried slowly out of the cluttered room and down the hallway, she did the best she could to kick her legs and squirm out of his tight grasp. "Let me go you freak!' She exclaimed. "Haha you wish sweety, you need to be punished for what you did to my friend" Frank replied back to her.

"Take her downstairs" Carl replied while following the two down the steps. Kate at this point gave up struggling, her body was limp and a look of disgust and utter disappointment ran across her face, but maybe there is one more act of defiance to break free from his grasp and make a run out of here?
1231.title: Into a room on the second floor

choices: Answers the knock at the door
Decides to tickle Kate breaking Carl's orders
12311.content:
Once Frank got all the way down the stairs and made his way into the living room, Kate started to squirm once more. She tried using her hands to push his arms from bear hugging her upper body and trying to swing her legs back in a kicking motion to try and hurt him or make him fall, but his grasp was way too strong for her to get out. "Ahhh!" Squeals of effort came from Kate hoping her last effort would succeed. Frank plopped himself down on the couch with her in his lap still trying to squirm her way out.

Carl veered off from following those two into the living room to grab a couple things to ensure Kate would not be able to fight back very well. He came into the living room with a roll of duct tape in one of his hands."No no no no no no, please no! Just let me go!" were some of the pleas Kate yelled out. She squirmed in the lap of Frank but he kept her pinned down while grabbing her arms and brought them behind her back so that Carl could tape her wrists together. Kate was now not able to fend off Frank from touching her if he wanted to. Next, he wrapped her ankles together with several layers of tape just above her socks. Lastly, Carl took a piece of tape and tried to place it over her mouth. Kate kept turning her head left and right while yelling "No!" to avoid being silenced. Carl eventually managed to slap the piece of tape over her mouth so she could not protest any longer.

"I hope now you are going to cooperate" Carl stated while placing both of his hands on her thighs right below above her knees. He continued to speak while his hands started to ride up her thighs "This is how tonight is going to go, you behave yourself and we will not hurt you. If you decide to pull more of what you did earlier, we will have no choice but to punish you. Understood?" Carl told Kate sternly. She shook her head yes hesitantly while tears ran across her face. "Good girl" Carl responded back removing his hands from her thighs. "I am going to clean up and get ready for later tonight, remember Frank, she cannot be toyed with just yet" he said while walking out of the room.

Frank.....
12311.title: No

125.content:
After her parents left, Kate sat down on the couch for a moment.

She looked at her watch. Time was 10:00 a.m.

Kate sighed. She was looking forward to a relaxing day, but something was weighing in the back of her mind.

Volleyball.

Open tryouts were at school beginning Monday and she was nowhere near prepared. She'd told herself a dozen times a week that she would begin her running and lifting regime, but never got around to it. Now at home, all alone, with absolutely nothing to do, it became harder for her to delay it. She knew if she didn't run at least today and tomorrow, she'd be too winded to keep up.

Resigning herself, Kate went upstairs and changed into her running gear. She could still feel the cool fall air coming in through her bedroom window. Not quite cold enough for running pants. She'd go with shorts, t-shirt and long sleeve sweatshirt over.

Unfortunately, the only sweatshirt available in her closet was to small. Laundry day was today. Selection was limited.

Kate put the sweatshirt on over her t-shirt, pulled up her shorts and laced her shoes. She stood in front of the mirror to stretch.

Sure enough when she raised her arms, the small sweatshirt grabbed the bottom of her t-shirt and rose above her bellybutton. She hated wearing this sweatshirt. Every time she did and stretched, anyone within arms length would scratch her belly.

Annoyed her to no end.

Well hopefully no one will be out today.

Kate rushed downstairs and out into the cool autumn morning. She locked the door behind her, put her key in her pocket and began to jog.

Heading into her neighborhood, she veered quickly towards her right to the woods. There was a biker's path in there that the neighborhood always used for bike rides and long runs. It was a five mile looping path that led deep into the forest. Perfect for mornings like this. No cars to worry about, no bratty kids.

Kate headed into the path and picked up her pace.

About two miles or so into the path, a strange noise hit her hears.

It sounded like................
125.title: Go for a Run

1251.content:
....................hysterical laughter.

Kate crept quietly down the path. Where was it coming from?

She wandered straight down the path for a quarter mile before she saw two pairs of shoes and socks tossed casually on the side of the path.

The laughter was louder now.

It wasn't coming from the path, but off to the right side.

Kate grew apprehensive.

Should she keep going on her run or investigate?
1251.title: Laughter

12511.content:
By now she was able to distinguish words that were yelled in the brief interruptions of the hysterical laughter. "Nooooohoooo not theeehereee" or "Pleeeease sttttooooooooop". Kate's mind raced between shock and curiosity. What was going on in this isolated place at this time of the day. Usually she would only encounter hedgehogs or possibly a deer. The voices sounded like someone her age, kids certainly, but at this high pitch impossible to distinguish whether male or female.

Probably she should run and call the police. Kate knew that the mobile phone network did not work properly in those woods. Police needed evidence, right? But what would she tell the policemen when they arrived and found nothing but silence in the woods?

The girl grabbed the socks and sneakers, one pair with a shade of pink that a boy would not buy or wear, hesitated and continued to run on the path. Maybe she should contact some of her friends instead to help her investigate?

Did she make it out of the woods?
12511.title: Run

125112.content:
No. The guilt of leaving whoever was behind was too much for her.

Staying low, Kate crept through the woods as carefully as possible. She dared not make too much noise and attract attention.

The laughter was growing louder. She could hear a harsh voice asking questions.

"Where is the jewelry?"

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I DON'T KNOW HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHHA!"

Ducking behind a nearby line of bushes, Kate peeked through the branches and could see the source of the laughter.

Two women were tied up in a clearing.

Kate recognized them and soon relaized where she was. The clearing was at the edge of the large property that belonged to Emilia Knox, a rich woman from Wales, who lived in an enormous house with her daughter, Kay. Kay had just recently graduated college and had babysat Kate when she was younger. Emilia had come to America after her husband disappeared ten years ago and she and her daughter lived a quiet life in town. There were rumors of how rich they were, but Kate never knew what to believe.

Now she saw the 46 year old Welsh woman in her long sleeved pajamas seated on the ground with her back against a large tree. Emilia's hands were tied behind her back and her legs were straight out in front of her, tied at the ankles and knees. A blindfold covered her eyes and a rope wound around the tree pinned her shoulders to the tree. Her shoulder length brown hair was swaying, as she kept turning her head at the laughter from the other side of the tree, while she wiggled her pale bare feet nervously

Kay must be the one laughing.

Kate slid over to see the other side. Kay was tied up like her mother. Her hands were tied behind her back, her shoulders were pinned to the tree and her bare feet were tied at the ankles and knees. Kay was wearing pajama pants and a white t-shirt that stopped right at the top of her bellybutton. Her long brown hair was matted beneath her blindfold, as laughter emanated from her ruby lips.

"HHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH STOP STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Kate could see a large, muscular woman kneeling at the edge of Kay's feet. Her long fingers were tickling the Welsh girl's bare feet and toes. Standing beside them, was a woman in a maid's outfit. Kate recognized her a Margaret, the longtime help for the two women.

Margaret smiled devilishly as Kay continued to have her feet tickled.

"C'mon now Kay. I know you know where the family jewels are kept. Just tell me and this stops."

"HEHEHEHEHEHAHAHAHHHHAHAHAHAHAHA I DON'T KNOW HAHAHAHAHAHAH I SWEAR HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHA!"

"Ok then. It only gets worse."

Margaret snapped her fingers and instantly, the muscular henchwoman..................
125112.title: No

1251123.content:
.................picked up her pace and scribbled her nails across Kay's feet and toes.

The young Welsh girl began convulsing in laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"It stops only if you tell me," Margaret taunted.

Kay shook her head from side to side in hysterical laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA STOP STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHHA!"

The henchwoman was an expert tickler. Her sharp nails hit every sensitive spot on the girl's feet, driving her mad with laughter.

Emilia kept trying to free herself to stop the madness, but the ropes were too tight.

Margaret began to grow impatient.

"C'mon now Kay! I'm running out of kindness! Tell me what I want to know or it gets worse!"

Beads of sweat were running down the girl's face until...................
1251123.title: Continued with Kay's feet

12511232.content:
"Enough!" Emilia commanded.

The henchwoman stopped tickling. Kay began panting and giggling as she was granted a break.

Margaret looked over at the tied up Welsh woman.

"Something to say Miss Knox?"

"Yes," Emilia began, "Kay doesn't know. Really. I've never told her."

Margaret's grin grew wider.

"So YOU'RE the only one who knows?"

Emilia gulped.

"Y-yes."

Margaret nodded.

"Well then......I guess I have only one question for Kay left."

Kneeling down beside Kay, Margaret whispered.

"I know you tickle your mom all the time. I've heard you. So tell me.............where is she most ticklish?"

Kay stammered.

"Um...I....don't......heheheheheheheheeheheheheheheheheehehehehehheh eheehehehehehehehehe!"

The Welsh girl was cut off as Margaret began to lightly poke and scratch her tummy. The girl's t-shirt offered little protection, as Margaret's fingeres wiggled all over her torso.

"C'mon now," Margaret teased, "out with it. Where do we tickle her?"

"Hheheheheheheheheheeheheheheheheheheheehe her.....her................"
12511232.title: Emilia stops everything

125112321.content:
...............heheheh her feet tickle her feet!"

Margaret instantly stopped and motioned for her henchwoman to go to the other side of the tree.

Emilia gulped nervously as she heard the heavy footsteps coming towards her.

"No. Stay away from my feet!"

The henchwoman knelt in from of Emilia's pale feet. Margaret stood close to the Welsh woman's face.

"Miss Knox," Margaret said, crouching down, "you know what we're looking for. And I know how ticklish you are. I hear Kay chasing you around the house all the time and how much you laugh when she catches you. That's why I hired Brooke. She's known as the 'Tennessee Tickler.' Notorious for tickling people crazy. And considering how ticklish you are..........."

Margaret gently wiggles one of her fingers on the side of Emilia's neck. Instantly, a huge grin crosses the 46 year old woman's face. She leans in the direction of the tickling finger and begins to snort and giggle as Margaret tickles her neck.

"Eeek hehehehehe no hehehehehe stop that heheheheehehe cut it out heheheheehehehehehe!"

Margaret smiles triumphantly. She stops tickling the neck.

"As I said.....given how ticklish you are....you know what you're in for. Like so."

She gestures to Brooke. Brooke takes two fingers and gently drags one up each of the Welsh woman's bare feet. She delicately traces all over Emilia's sensitive soles and scratches her toes.

The Welsh woman's grin grow larger. Her giggling and snorting grow more frantic.....even beginning to turn into belly laughter.

"Heheheeh snort hahahahahahahahahahaahahaAHHAHAHAHAHAAH no no stop stop that tickles AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHeheheheheheheeheheheheh!"

Brooke doesn't slow down or speed up. She keeps using her two fingers to tease the sensitive skin and toes. She tickles gently enough to elicit laughter, but not to bring it to a torturous level. Emilia's laughter is steady, but she is still able to breathe. She shakes her head as she giggles.

"Heheheheheheheheh stop that heheheheheheheehehehehehehe not my toes heheheheheheheheheheeheheheheheheheheheheheeheheheheheheheeheheheheheheh!"
Margaret smiles, but motions for Brooke to keep tickling at her current pace.

"Look how much you're laughing Miss Knox. And that's only starting. Imagine if you refuse. Your feet'll get worse. And I'll start doing this."

She brings her finger back to Emilia's neck and gently starts tickling one side. Emilia yelps and brings her head back to her shoulder, trapping the finger but not stopping the tickling.

"EEEP hahahahahahahahaahahahahaahahahaha oh god no hahahahahahahahahaahahahahahahahahaha!"

"And even if you refuse still........there's still your armpits, your knees, your thighs......your BELLY."

Margaret whispered that last part harshly, causing Emilia's grin to temporarily vanish for a look of panic. The grin returned as Margaret picked up the pace of her neck tickling, but Margaret took note of panicked expression at the mention of Emilia having her belly tickled.

"So," Margert continued, removing her finger from the neck again, "what will it be? Will you tell me or should we continue?"

A stream of giggles poured out of Emilia's mouth as Brooke continued to tease her feet. She was beginning to sweat and her stomach was starting to ache from the giggles.

After a few more moments of light tickling, Emilia decided to.................
125112321.title: Feet

choices: Kate jumped out to help them
Emilia tried to call for help
1251123211.content:
Give in.

"Heheheheheheheh ok ok you win hehehehehehehe I give up heheheheheheheheheh I'll talk."

"Good," Margaret ginned triumphantly, "Brooke will continue her tickling until you finish telling me."

Brooke obediently nodded and continued tracing the Welsh woman's bare wiggling feet.

Emilia shook her head and continued laughing.

"Heheheheheh the attic hahahhahahahahahahaahah they're in the attic."

"I see," Margaret replied, "where in the attic?"

"Hhahahahahaha by the window hahahahahahahaha a box by the window!"

"Isn't the attic usually locked," Margaret continued, "where's the key?"

Before Emilia could answer, she let out a quick gasp in between her giggling. Margaret gently let one of her fingers fall on the side of Emilia's pudgy tummy. The Welsh woman's long sleeve pajama top could not protect her. Margaret slowly led the finger slide along the side of Emilia's love handles.

A note of panic set in Emilia's laughter.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHH MY ROOM HAHAHAHAHAH MY JEWELRY BOX HAHAHAHAH THE KEY'S THERE HAHAHAHAHAHA I SWEAR."

Satisfied, Margaret moved her finger and motioned for Brooke to stop.

"Wonderful, Miss Knox. Thank you for being so cooperative. Now.....Brooke will be waiting for me on the edge of your yard. A short distance away. I will go to the attic and retrieve what I need. If either of you make a noise....call for help.....Brooke will come back and tickle you both. If I find out you lied to me....................."

Margaret leaned close to Emilia's ear and whispered in a tone that only Emilia could hear.

"I will tickle your bare belly. Is that clear?"

A panicked look overcame Emilia. She shook her head obediently.

"Yes! Yes!"

"Good."

Margaret stood up and motioned for Brooke to follow. As soon as the two were gone.......................
1251123211.title: Talk

choices: All three women duck behind Kate's hiding spot
12511232111.content:
..............Kate leapt from her hiding spot.

She slid slowly over to the tree. Emilia immediately panicked at the sound of footsteps and whispered.

"Who's there?"

"It's Kate," Kate whispered, "Don't worry Miss Knox. I'll get you guys out of here."

Kate began undoing the knots holding both women and then........................
12511232111.title: Kate jumped out to help them

choices: Brooke was hot on their trail
125112321112.content:

Her pale, pudgy belly was completely exposed, as were her underarms, which were offered little protection in spite of being covered. Waiting until Kay disappeared to track down the police, Kate quietly made her way through the forest.

The land was small and most of the space was taken up by the enormous manor house that stood in the center of the property. Unfortunately, the neighborhood was pretty spaced out and the house was far from the road. No passersby would suspect anything was going on.

Hopping onto the back veranda, Kate saw that one of the back doors hadn't been closed all the way.

She moved over to it and found herself inside the garage.

The light switch was on. They'd come through here.

The door leading from the garage into the house was closed. Kate grasped the handle gently and slowly turned it.

Success.

She was led into the expansive kitchen. Emilia's laughter was echoing throughout the entire house. They were already tickling her.

"Margaret told me this was your worst spot. Now I'll know for sure."

Removing her hands and rising to her feet, Brooke saw Margaret a short distance away. The maid carried a large bag in her hands.

Margaret and her henchwoman moved around to the side of the tree where Emilia was still tied. Margaret looked down at the tied up single mother, with her feet and belly exposed.

"No. I swear. I can't see anything."

Margaret looked down at her prisoner and smiled.

"She comes with us."

"What about the daughter?"

"Who cares? We have what we need. We just need to buy time to get away."

Margaret knelt down by the trapped Welsh woman.

"And having a hostage will come in handy."

Margaret reached a finger out and gently dragged it across Emilia's pale belly. Emilia snickered and giggled as the nail traced across her skin.

"Won't it Miss Knox?"

Emilia refused to answer. Margaret motioned to Brooke.

"Untie the rope pinning her to the tree. Carry her with us to the truck."

Obediently, Brooke undid the ropes wound around Emilia's shoulders. Keeping the Welsh woman's wrists tied behind her back and ankles tied, Brooke scooped the middle aged woman off the ground and threw her over shoulders.

---
About fifty yards down the path, the two girls saw that the wooded pathway ended. There was a curb ahead and an empty cul-de-sac. Seeing the outlines of the three women they were pursuing, Kate and Kay ducked behind a series of bushes to keep out of sight.

From their hiding spot, they saw Emilia, still blindfolded, tied at the ankles and barefoot in her pajamas, standing with Brooke behind her. The muscular henchwoman had her hands firmly gripped on Emilia shoulders, holding her in place.

Margaret was undoing the ropes around Emilia's wrists. Once the rope was loosed, she brought Emilia's wrists in front of her and re-wrapped the rope around the Welsh woman's wrists.

A second rope was then produced and looped through the one binding Emilia's wrists. This second rope was handed to Brooke.

The henchwoman led Emilia to a nearby thick tree, where she brought the Welsh woman's wrists high above her head and ran the second rope around the tree, pinning the chubby Welsh woman's forearms and rendering her unable to move.

With her arms stretched above her head, Emilia was forced to balance on the balls of her feet, while her long sleeve pajama top rode high above her bellybutton. The pale, chubby belly now fully exposed, began to twitch with ticklish anticipation, as Margaret stepped forward and lightly wiggled her fingers along the sensitive skin. Emilia helpless giggled as her tummy was gently and torturously tickled.

"Now Miss Knox," Margaret teased, spider tickling her fingers along Emilia's love handles, "Brooke and I are getting the truck. Same rules apply as before. Any sound, any attempt to escape and I will tickle torture your belly right here. Is that clear?"

"Heheheheheh yes yes hehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehehee"

"I am not kidding Ms. Knox," Margaret continued, her fingers delighting in their torment, "I can make this even worse for you than you think."

Finishing this threat, Margaret's wiggling fingers dropped to the sides of Emilia's bare waist and slowly, torturously wiggled their way up her ticklish bare sides, the bottoms of her bare ribs and up the long sleeve pajama top, where they stopped at her bare underarms.

Margaret then slowly brought them back down to her bare waist. Emilia's giggling kicked into high gear during the entire ordeal.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHEHEHEHEHEHEHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE! 4;

"See what I mean, Miss Knox?" Margaret teased, retracing her fingers along that same path several times, each one more rapid than the last, "Not a sound from you. Understand?"

Emilia giggled hysterically in reply.

"YES YES YES HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAH!"

"Excellent."

The tickling stopped. Emilia stood panting, her exposed belly heaving in and out from the ticklish torment.

Margaret motioned for Brooke to follow her and the two left to retrieve the truck.

At moment, Kay and Kate decided on their next move.

They would..............
125112321122121.title: Follow them to the truck

It was too strange not too look. She had to find out.

Crouching low, she moved off the path and into the woods. The sound of the laughter guided her about one hundred yards into the thick forest.

There she could see three muscular women in sports bras and yoga pants. There were two others she couldn't quite see who were laughing hysterically.

Luckily there was a rock wall nearby that provided perfect cover. Ducking behind it, Kate peered to see what the source of the laughter was.

To her shock, she saw.............

................two people.

The three muscular women were surrounding two tied up people. Two identical trees were holding them. Each captive was tied to a tree, arms raised above their heads and their feet a few inches from the ground. Feet were bare.

One of the muscular women was kneeling down and tickling a foot for each person. That was the laughter source.

The person on the left tree was female. She was dressed in black yoga pants and a gray sweatshirt. That sweatshirt was pulled over her head to cover her eyes, showing off her bright pink sports bra, and bare armpits and belly.

The person on the right tree was male. He was in jeans and a black sweater. The black sweater was pulled over his head as well, leaving his entire torso bare.

Both captives could be heard laughing hysterically through their sweaters as they feet and toes were tortured and tickled.

One of the muscular women who was standing turned to the other one beside her.

"Katrina. Help Annie with their feet."

Katrina nodded and knelt beside her companion. Annie moved to the man's feet. Katrina to the woman's. Now all four feet were being tickled.

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA" the woman laughed, "HAHAHAH ANONONOTBOTHFEET HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"

The muscular woman standing smiled sadistically.

"I know you two saw us robbing the Sanderson house. Annie and Katrina spotted you! You're gonna tell us what you know now!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHWE DONT KNOW ANYTHING EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE" the man giggled.

"Oh yes you do! You do and you'll give us up if we let you go!

"HAHAHAHAHHEHEHEHHEHEHHEHHOHOHOHHAHAHHEHHEHEHEHWE DONT KNOW ANYTHING HAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH"

"HAHHAHAHAHEHHEHEHEHEHEHAHEHEHEHEHEHE LET US GO HAAHHHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

The standing muscular woman rubbed her chin thoughtfully. She wasn't convinced. It'd be too risky to believe them. After all, she was sure the three of them had planned everything out perfectly. They'd waited until the right moment when the Sandersons left. Bypassed the alarms. Gotten in and out in seconds! It was flawless.

Then they saw the couple on the walking path. They had to have figured the trio out.

Luckily they'd caught them.

Annie and Katrina delicately scribbled their fingers on the flailing feet. The two captives were nearly breathless with laughter, but adamant that they had not seen anything.

Again the standing muscular woman was not convinced.

"Annie. Katrina. Stop for a second."

Obediently the tickling stopped. The captives breathed heavily.

Annie turned to the standing woman.

"What do you think Brooke? Should we let them go?"

Brooke shook her head.

"I think I'm not convinced yet. I think we need to pick things up."

The captive woman winced.

"Wha-what do you mean?"

Brooke grinned and moved closer to the captives. Her eyes moved from their bare feet up to their bare bellies and armpits.

She laughed.

"I think we need to move to........................"
125122.title: A man and a woman

1251221.content:
..............another spot!"

Turning to her friends, Brooke snapped her fingers.

"Girls. Get their tummies!"

"Oh no!" the man gasped, "Not my belly! Not there!"

"Please!" the woman begged.

It was no use.

Annie plunged her digits into the man's pale, chubby belly sending him into hysterical laughter, while Katrina gleefully dug into the woman's tanned tummy.

"HAHAHAHAHAHHHEHHEHEHEHEHHAHAHAHAHHAHEHHEHEHEHHAHAHHAHAHA!"

Brooke grinned at their laughter. If they knew anything, this would surely push them over the edge. Annie was enjoying herself as she played with the man's sides and ribs. Her fingers scratched his ticklish skin with great effect.

This was truly his most ticklish spot.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHANONONOHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAI'MTOOTICKLISHHAHAHHEHEHEHEH EHHEHHEHEHH!"

Katrina, not to be outdone, kicked her tickling into higher gear. The woman had more defined abs than her companion and Katrina found that her light wiggling fingers were driving her ticklee insane.

"EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH EH!"

As the tummy tickling continued, Brooke spoke again.

"Well you two?" she asked. "Are you going to confess?!"
1251221.title: Their Bellies

12512211.content:
"Yes hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha. I'll tell. I'll tell heheheehehheheeheheheheheheheh!"

It was the man who broke first.

With a snap of Brooke's fingers, Annie and Katina backed away from the two bare bellies, leaving their captives heaving and panting.

Brooke let them breathe for a second before asking.

"Well? I'm waiting."

"We saw you come out of the house," the man admitted, "with all that stuff under your arms."

"Do you remember our faces?"

Silence.

Brooke motioned to Annie to move back over and start tickling again. Annie dug furiously into the man's bare sides sending him into hysterical laughter again.

"OHOHAHAHAHEHHEHEHEHHEHAHAHAHAHA STOP STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH"

"Do YOU REMEMBER?"

"HAHAHHAHAHAHAH YES YES I REMEMBER HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"

Brooke motioned for Annie to stop. Annie complied and backed away.

Now Brooke moved towards the tied up woman. She motioned for Katina to begin tickling her.

"How about you sweetheart?"

Silence.

Katina tickled the woman's tight abs, causing her to wiggle and giggle hysterically.

"OHNO HEHEHEHEHEHHEAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA"

"How about you?!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH YES YES I REMEMBER HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHH"

Katina stopped. Brooke shook her head.

"You two can ID us. No way we can let you go. You're gonna have to come with us."

She turned to Annie.

"Annie bring the car to the cul-de-sac. Katina you go with her. I'm gonna need you to bring the extra rope in the back so we can tie these two up tighter."

Both girls nodded and headed off to carry out their orders.

This just left Brooke standing guard in front of the two captives. Kate peered over the hedge and saw that Brooke's back was to her.

She couldn't leave those two to be tickled to death. She had to do something.

But what?
12512211.title: Yes!

125122112.content:
A diversion! If she could get Brooke away from those two for a minute, Kate could untie them.

But how?

Searching near her, Kate spots a small rock. That gives her an idea.

Creeping ever so carefully over to it, Kate snatches it and heaves it far off into the distance.

The rock falls with a faint "Crack."

That grabs Brooke's attention.

She takes a few steps over in the direction the rock went.

Was it her imagination?

Kate finds and hurls a second rock. Brooke rubs her chin thoughtfully. She couldn't take chances if someone else is out there.

She decides to investigate.

But first, she decides to give her captives a little reminder of something.

"All right you two," Brooke orders, "I'm gonna check out that sound. I don't wanna hear a peep from either of you. Is that clear?"

The two captives nod.

Brooke sports a devilish smile. She wiggles her fingers on the man and woman's ribs.

"Is it?!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAH YES YES HAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHA!"

Brooke stops.

"Good."

She then trots off into the distance.

Kate wastes no time and darts out into the open.

She eyes the two tied up figures and decides to.................
125122112.title: Create a distraction

choices: All three are caught in another booby trap
1251221121.content:
...............help them.

Cautiously tiptoeing over, Katie whispers to the two captives.

"I bought us some time. She'll be back in a few minutes. I'm going to untie you and we'll make a break for it. Nod if you're willing to go along."

Both people nod.

Deftly, Katie unties to the two captives, who drop silently to the ground and remove their blindfolds. They both hug Katie in gratitude.

"We'll have time for that later." Katie whispered. "What are your names?"

"Jaime." the man replied.

"Tammy." the girl answered.

"Okay. I need you to follow me, I know where we can hold up for a while."

Motioning for them to follow, the three make their way over to the cart path.

What happens next?
1251221121.title: Untie them

12512211211.content:
Luckily, the three are able to make their way down the cart path and exit the woods.

As they stand at the entrance, wondering what to do next, Katie notices that Jaime and Tammy are without their shoes.

"You guys need place to rest until we can get your shoes back. Quick, my house isn't far."

Obediently, the two captives follow Katie to her home, where they frantically run inside and lock the door.

Resting on the sofas in her living room, Katie asks the question that's been on her mind for a while.

"How did that happen to you guys?"

Tammy answered.

"Jaime and I always meet up to go for walks in the morning. Today we happened to take a new route and saw those three women robbing someone else's house. We thought we could get away, but they were too quick. They were gonna tickle us until we agreed to stay silent."

"They probably wouldn't have tickled us," Jaime lamented, "if you hadn't been tickling me when we were walking."

"Is that how they spotted you?" Katie asked.

Jaime nodded.

"Yes. I was the first one off the path and let Tammy walk behind me. That's when I felt her hands go up my sweater and start tickling my sides. She always does that. My belly's way too ticklish and she knows it. Unfortunately that's when we got spotted and that's how they knew to tickle us."

Tammy laughed.

"Well maybe next time don't stretch like that in front of me."

She turned to Katie.

"He decided to raise his arms to stretch and his sweater rose up. I could see his belly. How did he not expect me to tickle?"

She turned back to Jaime.

"Here raise your arms."

Jaime did and sure enough his sweater rose above his bellybutton. Tammy dug into his bare sides immediately.

"See? It's way to easy."

"Hahahahahahahh stop it stop it ahahahahhahahahahahaahahaha!"

Tammy scribbled her nails all over his belly.

"Forgive me Jaime?"

"Hahahahahaha yes yes ahahahahahahahahah i give i give hahahahahhahahaha."

Tammy stopped. Jaime clutched his sides and curled up on the couch.

Katie smiled in relief that all three were okay. Then she decided to................
12512211211.title: They successfully exit the woods

125122112113.content:
Katie yawned deeply. After all the excitement from the morning, she'd forgotten she hadn't slept that well.

"I'm gonna head upstairs for second. Make yourselves at home and when I come back down, we can figure out how to get you guys back home."

Katie headed upstairs to her room and collapsed on the bed. As soon as her head hit the pillow her eyelids fell shut.

After what seemed like hours, Katie was roused awake.

It was coming from downstairs.

What was it?
125122112113.title: Go upstairs for a nap

1251221121131.content:
Katie slowly got out of bed and tiptoed to the edge of the stairs.

The sound was hysterical laughter.

Katie crept down the stairs to find the source of the sound.

As she peered downstairs, she saw the laughing culprit was...........
1251221121131.title: Laughter

12512211211312.content:
.......Jaime. Again.

He was being tickled by Tammy on his...........
12512211211312.title: Jaime

1253.content:
.....................something howling.

Kate stopped in her tracks. She waited to see if she heard again.

It came...........but it wasn't a howl.

BOOM!

The rumbling of thunder.

Kate looked up and through the canopy of trees she could see thick black clouds gathering.

Suddenly, she felt a sharp pain on her head.

A halestone!

It suddenly became a potentially dangerous situation to be outside.

Looking around her, Kate saw a small clearing a few yards away. Moving towards it, she saw a rich green backyard with an enormous manor house.

She recognized the property instantly. It was the home of Emilia Knox, a 46 year old Welsh woman, who had recently moved to the area from abroad. Her twenty one year old daughter Kay lived with her and had just completed college in the UK. She continued to stay with her mother while she did grad school nearby.

Kate was on friendly terms with them, so when another harsh rumble of thunder came and she could feel the rain drops picking up and the sound of a few hailstones with them, she rushed through the yard to seek shelter.

By the time she reached the front door of the Knox's home, the rain suddenly came down in sheets. The poor girl was soaked to the bone and a chill passed through her as the temperature dropped with the rainfall.

Luckily there was a large overhang covering the front porch, so she was safe from the rain and the hail, which now began picking up.

Kate rang the front doorbell and waited in the safety of the front porch.

She was waiting only a few seconds when the door opened and she was greeted by.......................................
1253.title: Something howling

choices: Emilia called from down the hallway
The sound of a window shattering was heard
12533.content:
....................Emilia's daughter, Kay.

The young girl appeared in the doorway dressed in pajama pants, slippers and a sweatshirt. She took one look at the soaked Kate before ushering her into the house.

"Get in here! You're crazy!"

In a flash Kate hopped through the doorway. Kay closed the door behind her.

From upstairs a voice called down.

"Kay? Who was it?"

"Kate, Mom!" Kay called back, "She got caught out in the hailstorm."

"My goodness! Well get her a change of clothes. She's welcome to stay as long as she likes. I'm getting dressed now and I'll be right out."

Kay suppressed a devious smile as her mother finished speaking. Kate noticed it and gave Kay a strange look.

"Oh. Don't worry," Kay said, "I'll tell you all about it in a few minutes. Meantime.......I'll get you some dry clothes."

Kate followed her host up the long winding staircase and towards the small, richly furnished bedroom of the twenty-one year old.

Kay provided another pair of pajama pants and sweatshirt, which Kate gratefully slipped into after shaking off her wet clothes.

"Let me take those," Kay offered, "I'll have Rebecca throw into the laundry for you."

"Thanks."

"No problem," Kay replied.

She then called down the hallway.

"Rebecca? Can you come here?"

In a few seconds another young girl dressed in a maid's uniform appeared. Rebecca was one of two nurses who served in the Knox household. The other was her mother, Margaret. Rebecca and Kay had a very good repore, as they were close to the same age, so Rebecca did not carry the normal formalities.

"Yes Kay?"

"Would you mind tossing these down the laundry chute? My friend Kate is going to hang out here until the storm passes, but I'd like her clothes to get dry."

"No problem." Rebecca replied.

As she turned to go, Kay quickly grasped her by the arm and looked out into the hallway towards Emilia's room.

"Did mom notice what you and Margaret did yet?"

Rebecca shook her head.

"Not yet.......are you sure she won't be upset?"

"Oh she will be upset......but I told you how you guys can handle that."

Rebecca nodded hesitatingly.

"I guess....just."

Kay gave her a pat on the shoulder.

"Don't worry. It'll be fun. I promise. Is your mom in position?"

"Yes. She's making the bed in your mom's room."

"Good. Once you put that stuff into the laundry, come back here."

Rebecca agreed and sped off.

Kate looked at Kay curiously.

"What's going on?"

Kay turned to answer, but before she could...................................
12533.title: Kay Knox

choices: Rebecca pinned Emilia's arms behind her back
125331.content:
......................Emilia's voice echoed down the hallway.

"Margaret! What's the meaning of this?!"

Kay snickered and motioned for Kate to follow her.

"Here." she whispered, "I'll show you."

Tiptoeing down the hallway, both girls slipped across the open bedroom door and crouched close by.

Inside the room they could see the figure of Margaret, dressed in her maid's uniform, standing by the end of the bed with a look of confusion.

"What seems to be the trouble Miss Knox?" Margaret asked innocently.

Emilia Knox now came into view. She was dressed in jeans and barefoot. She was also sporting a v-neck t-shirt and a v-neck windbreaker on top of it. Unfortunately, the windbreaker and t-shirt beneath only reached to the bottom of the 46 year old woman's ribcage. Emilia's pale pot belly and bellybutton were completely exposed.

Kay snickered at the sight.

"What did you do?" Kate whispered.

"I paid Margaret and Rebecca a hundred dollars each to do it."

"Do what?"

"Trim mom's clothes. All her shirts, sweaters, sweatshirts, jackets. They've all been cut into midriffs. None of them go past mom's ribs."

"Why do that?"

Kay turned to Kate with a devious look.

"It'll make sense in a few seconds. Watch."

Looking through the bedroom door, Kate could see Margaret shift around the bed and move closer to Emilia. The middle-aged Welsh woman moved with her and now had her back to the door.

"Margaret," Emilia scolded, "Why are all my clothes like this?! When did this happen?"

"I'm not sure." Margaret lied.

"Nonsense," Emilia mused, "my daughter had something to do with this, didn't she?"

Margaret shrugged.

"Perhaps."

Emilia shook her head. She was use to her daughter's pranks.

"What's the joke this time? What's she planning?"

As Margaret stalled Emilia, Rebecca came back into view in the hallway. Kay signaled to her to go into the room.

Rebecca tiptoed through the doorway, quietly enough that Emilia did not notice her come in.

Margaret did however.

"Well Margaret?" Emilia scolded, "What is she planning?"

"Well Miss Knox," Margaret began, seeing Rebecca close behind Emilia, "it was this."

Suddenly.........................
125331.title: Emilia called from down the hallway

1253313.content:
.............Rebecca took two fingers and gently poked Emilia's bare sides.

The Welsh woman's eyes nearly bugged out of her sockets as she leapt a foot in the air.

Margaret took a step back in amazement at the reaction.

A stream of giggles poured out of Emilia's mouth as she quickly covered the front of her exposed belly and faced Rebecca.

"Hheheheeh REBECCA HOW DARE YO-----OHOHOHOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOH!"

Before she could finish, Margaret reached out and gently poked the bare sides herself. Emilia turned to face her, before facing another tickle attack from Rebecca.

Soon both maids were poking Emilia's bare belly so quickly that the Welsh woman couldn't keep up.

"EEEEH HAHAHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHH STOP STOP DONT DO THAT HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH!"

"Sorry Miss Knox," Margaret said amused, "Kay's orders. If you got upset with us, we're to tickle you until you forgive us."

"OHOHOHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHHHEHEH!"

Emilia was laughing too hard as her pot belly was poked and tickled to even respond. She felt to the ground and tried rolling up into a ball to protect herself. Unfortunately, due to the dedicated work of both maids, the windbreaker she wore left too much of her stomach and back exposed, leaving the two women plenty of ticklish skin to tickle.

Kay chuckled devilishly.

"So..............you had them do it to tickle her?"

"Absolutely!" Kay laughed, "Do you know HOW ticklish my mom is?"

Kate shook her head.

"It's bad." Kay said, "Really bad. Everywhere. Armpits. Feet. Knees. But her belly............is the worst of it. It's her biggest weakness. I have so much fun tickling her. She barely puts up a fight. The minute you start tickling her belly, she loses it!"

Kate looked on and could see Kay was telling the truth. Emilia was rolling helplessly on the ground, but made no effort to push away the tickling hands.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH! PLEASE STOP!"

"Not until you say Rebecca and I are forgiven."

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I FORGIVE YOU HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

"Promise?" Margaret teased, as she poked the chubby tummy.

"HAHAHAHAHA YES YES AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH I FORGIVE YOU HAHAAHAHAHAHAHAH!"

Margaret looked towards Kay, who now poked her head in the door.

Instantly, both maids stopped and sprinted out of the room. Once outside, they took positions along the wall across from Kay and Kate.

"What are they doing?" Kate asked.

"You'll see." Kay replied. "It's only the beginning."

Emilia lay on the ground catching her breath and doing her best to stop laughing. Slowly she got onto her feet. She started adjust the bottom of her windbreak......but stopped once she remembered it had been cut to stay below her ribs.

Sighing in frustration, Emilia stormed out of the doorway to her bedroom.

That's when......................
1253313.title: Rebecca poked Emilia from behind

12533132.content:
..................Kay let the signal loose.

"GET HER!"

Before Emilia knew what was happening, both maids and Kay pounced on her.

Emilia tried to resist, but Kay dug her fingers into her mother's exposed sides, sending her into hysterics and bringing her down to the ground. Once on the carpet, Kay continued to tickle her mom's belly, while Rebecca and Margaret each grabbed one of Emilia's bare feet and pinned them to the floor by the ankles.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH WHAT'S GOING ON HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Kay released her tickling fingers and grabbed her mom's wrists, bringing them high over her head.

"Quick Kate," Kay ordered. "Hold her wrists."

Obediently Kate did as she was did.

Emilia soon found herself with her legs and arms pinned. Her bare feet were exposed and vulnerable, while her entire bare belly lay exposed with the windbreaker rising higher above her ribs with her arms pinned.

"W-what's going on?" she asked nervously, "What are you doing?"

Kay kneeled next to her trapped mom.

"You've been really stressed and grouchy lately mom," Kay teased, "We're gonna make you smile. Can you guess how?"

Deviously, Kay began wiggling her fingers and started to lower them toward Emilia.

Emilia's eye's grew wide as she shook her head furiously.

"No no. Not that. Don't tickle me."

Kay stopped wiggling her fingers and nodded.

"Oh yes. We're gonna play a little game mom."

"I don't want to."

"Well you should. Either you agree to play the game I have in mind or............"

Kay motioned to the two maids at Emilia's feet. They each took a hand and began gently rubbing Emilia's bare feet. Kay took one of her fingers and gently traced it across Emilia's belly.

A wide grin and stream of giggles emerged.

"Hheheheheheheheeh oh no no heheheheheheheheheheheheeheheheheheheheh"

".........we're gonna tickle you right now. Your choice."

Emilia shook her head giggling as she thought about her predicament. Her bare belly and feet were sure to attacked if she refused.

After a few moments...........................
12533132.title: All four women grabbed Emilia

125331321.content:
....................she nodded her head in agreement.

"Hehehe ok ok I'll play heheheheheheheheheheeh."

"Excellent." Kay replied.

She motioned for the two maids to stop and the three women helped Emilia to her feet.

Kay moved behind her mother and told Margaret to grab a zip tie from one of the hall closets.

"What does she need that?" Emilia asked nervously.

"Because," Kay explained, "we're going to tie your hands in front of you for the part of the game. Keep you from getting any ideas of escaping. Speaking of which............."

Kay slowly snuck her hands beneath the windbreaker and laid them gently on her mother's bare sides.

"Hands up mom!"

Feeling the fingers on her ticklish belly, Emilia immediately shot her hands high above her head.

"Good," Kay replied, "this makes sure you know what'll happen if you move."

Kay smiled devilishly.

"That's why I had them cut your shirts and jackets. Now I can get your ticklish belly....anytime I want."

Emilia gulped.

While they waited for Margaret to return, Kay every so often let one of the fingers on the middle-aged Welsh woman's drag along her ticklish skin. Emilia's stomach would twitch and turn to escape it.

"Ah!" Kay would scold, "No moving."

"Hhehehe your fingers tickle hehehehehehehehehehehe"

Finally Margaret returned with the zip tie. Emilia was ordered to place her hands behind her, with her wrist one on top of the other. The zip tie was looped over her wrists, binding them together.

"Your hands stay there mom until we get to our destination."

Emilia nodded. She felt a bit ridiculous. Thanks to the cut jacket and her arms raised, her pale midriff and ribcage were now completely exposed.

Kay motioned for Margaret and Rebecca to come forward. One maid stood on one side and the other took the opposite. Each one was instructed to place one hand on the front of the Welsh woman's belly.

"You are to lead her first," Kay instructed, "the hands stay there the whole way. If she tries to move or run.........tickle her belly."

The maids nodded.

"Now," Kay said, "take our prisoner to..........................."
125331321.title: She agreed

1253313213.content:
....................the living room."

Rebecca and Margaret, keeping one hand each on the Welsh woman's tummy, led the captured woman downstairs. Kate and Kay followed.

In the living room, Kate, Margaret and Rebecca took their seats in the various lounge chairs facing the doorway.

By the doorway there was a small pillar with a hook protruding out for hanging plants. Kay looped Emilia's tied wrists through it, leaving the Welsh woman standing on the balls of her feet, with her hands tied high above her head. Her bare midriff was stretched in this position and it left her bare feet vulnerable.

Emilia struggled to balance on the front of her feet as she dangled by her wrists.

Kay stood by her and faced the two maids and Kate.

"Ok ladies," Kay announced, "welcome to 'The Most Ticklish Game.'"

She turned and motioned to her tied up mother.

"Meet our victim. Emilia Knox. 46 years old. Born in Wales. And..................incredibly ticklish."

The Welsh woman blushed at the last part. She still struggled to find her balance.

"Here's how it works," Kay began, "once I've finished my explanation, I will let Ms. Knox down from the hook. She will then have ten minutes to get her wrists loose and hide anywhere in the house. Once the ten minutes are up, each of us will look for her separately. No teams. Whoever finds her....................get to tickle her."

Emilia gulped and groaned.

"Oh no."

"Oh yes." Kay gleamed, "And just so we're all on the same page. Let me show you what spots are fair game."

Kay took a menacing step towards her mother. The trapped Welsh woman attempted to keep her at bay by lifting a foot and kicking her.

Unfortunately, Kay caught the ankle.

"Thanks for volunteering a spot mom!" Kay teased.

She held the ankle under her arm and turned to face the other three women.

"She's really ticklish on her feet and toes," Kay began, taking her index finger and tracing them over the bare sole and toes.

"Heheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheheehehhehe!"

"Then there's her knees and thighs," Kay continued, sliding her hands up the trapped leg and squeezing both areas.

"AHAHAHHEHEHEHHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAH!"

Kay put the leg down and moved to Emilia's right side.

"And of course, her neck and armpits," Kay continued, poking her right armpit and the right side of her neck.

"HAHAHAHAHHAHAAHAHAHAH," Emilia cackled, bringing her head down to her right side in a futile attempt to protect it.

Kay removed herself from the right side and moved in front of Emilia's bare belly.

"And of course," Kay finished, moving her wiggling fingers towards the bare midriff, "the worst of it all.............her ticklish tummy."

The ten wiggling fingers landed home. Emilia threw her head back in hysterical cackling laughter as her abs, ribs and sides were all hit.

"HAHAHAHHAHAHAHHHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA! "

The tickling lasted less than a minute, but even after Kay stopped and turned back to face the three women, Emilia continued to giggle silently to herself.

"So there you have it." Kay repeated. "Any of those areas are good. When you catch her, you have two choices: you can tie her up or you can tickle fight her. In any case, the tickling can last only five minutes. If you go beyond five minutes, then mom gets to tickle you. If you want to tie her up and she resists, then the tickling lasts ten minutes and all four of us participate."

She turned back to her mother at that last part.

"GOT IT mom?"

Emilia giggled and nodded. She was still trying to catch her breath.

"If you do the tickle fight," Kay warned, "and Ms. Knox's arms are free, then she can tickle back. If she overpowers you...well.....you're stuck until the five minutes are up. Is that clear?"

All three women nod.

"Good. Any tickling tools you find you can use. Otherwise.................let's get started."

Kay moved towards Emilia and unhooked her wrists. The 46 year old Welsh woman stood panting, with her tied wrists helplessly in front of her.

Kay looked at her watch.

"Okay mom, it is now 10:30 a.m. You have until 10:40 a.m. to free yourself and hide. Once 10:40 hits, the hunt is on. Oh....and no going outside. If you do and we catch you........we'll bring you back on the hook and tickle you. Now....g"

Kay didn't even need to say go before her terrified mother ran off around the house to hide.

All four tickle hunters sat in the living room, patiently waiting until the ten minutes elapsed.

Once the clock showed 10:40, all four women got up and began to hunt.

Which one of them do we follow?
1253313213.title: The living room

choices: A knock came at the door
Kate felt someone tickle her feet
14.content:
It was a cool and sunny spring morning.

After her stretches, Kate threw on a sweatshirt and yoga pants and headed downstairs for breakfast.

Surprisingly, the house was empty.

Kate found a note from her mother saying she had taken Kelly to a dentist appointment and that her father was at work.

With the house to herself, Kate fixed a quick breakfast of cereal and sat down in the living room to watch TV.

After a few minutes..................
14.title: Flowers are growing, It's Spring time.

info.brief_description: A girl who gets into all types of ticklish/tickling situations, any part of the year
info.description:
This story is going to be about a girl named Kate who is 14 years old and just enter high school and very ticklish. Kate finds herself in many different types of tickling situations. Kate is into sports and is in very good shape. She is on the high school woman's soccer team and likes to go for runs in the woods right behind her house. she also does not know about the tickling situations she will encounter.

Her outfits are usually small shirts also crop tops and jeans and yoga pants and her Pajamas are usually a tank top and pajamas bottoms.

Her ticklish spots going from the most to the least are her belly, belly button, ribs, underarms, thighs, and feet.

For the situations she encounters, they can be anything from her boyfriend tickling to her a tickling Witch that uses tickle spells to a tickling carnival. You can get as creative as you want. Also you can pick a season or a holiday or any part of the year you want. like summer can be "4th of July", Labor day, a summer vacation to a tickle town. Winter can be Christmas time and new year eve with all types of tickling situations from meeting Santa Claus to anything. Fall can be Halloween and thanksgiving. spring can be Easter, St. Patrick's day and spring break. So get as creative as you want. You decide on the Adventure you want her to go on and how the tickling goes.

Rules:
I made this story 13+, which means clothes stay on. she can wear crop tops and a bathing suit, but can not be naked. I will delete the chapter. must be fully clothed.
No swearing
no Killing
no guy tickling
no gay stuff
keep it clean. thank you

one other thing, chapters need a paragraph or two long. each paragraph needs to be at least 5 sentences

lastly get creative and have fun
info.pretty_title: A day in the life of a ticklish Girl
